item.title: [SBG5][Workflow Management] - Mistral
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jan 10, 2023, 13:00 - 16:00 UTC

Dec 8, 22:35 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 10/01/2023 13:00 UTC 
End time : 10/01/2023 16:00 UTC 
Service impact : All mistral endpoints of SBG5 will be unreachable for 5 minutes
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our services, we will migrate Mistral to a new production platform.

item.title: [Global][Public Cloud] MKS upgrades of all managed cluster with an update policy set to ALWAYS UPDATE or to MAXIMUM SECURITY to the latest available patch version.
item.description:
Dec 16, 16:32 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Dec 15, 09:33 UTC
Update - Resumption of maintenance by our teams.

Dec 14, 17:13 UTC
Update - Our teams have completed the operations for this day. They will continue tomorrow. An update will be posted for the resumption of the operation

Dec 14, 10:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Dec 12, 22:24 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 14/12/2022 10:00 UTC
End time : 16/12/2022 05:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : This maintenance is scheduled to upgrade all clusters with a policy update configured by the customer to ALWAYS UPDATE (through the API Ovhcloud console) or to MAXIMUM SECURITY (through the Manager UI interface). 
With this maintenance, we will upgrade all concerned MKS services to the latest patch version provided by our team. For more details, please refer to the documentation.

item.title: [GRA][Storage] - Object Storage S3 Incident Notification
item.description:
Dec 16, 13:39 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 16/11/2022 10:11 UTC
End Time : 16/11/2022 11:08 UTC

Following reverting of the fix implementation, the technical teams have identified the precise cause of the QoS drop.
They have already made the necessary software changes to improve the QoS.

The incident has therefore been resolved. As part of our policy of continuous improvement, the technical teams will continue to work on the software as well as on the infrastructure to prevent this drop in QoS from recurring.

Dec 14, 10:56 UTC
Update - The fix has been reverted on GRA, and deployement is postponed on the other regions.
Our team is actively working on solving the issue by deploying another fix soon.
Customers will be informed when the new fix will be implemented.

Dec 12, 09:29 UTC
Update - The fix is now deployed on our infrastructure.
We are activating the fix today in the Graveline area.
The other regions will be activated tomorrow Tuesday. As soon as all regions are updated, we will post a new update

Dec 8, 15:59 UTC
Update - The fix has been successfully tested and our teams are in the process of deploying the fix to production services.

Dec 5, 14:53 UTC
Update - Our teams are currently testing a fix before the implementation which will solve the bug causing these issues.

Dec 2, 10:10 UTC
Update - Update: The situation remains stabilized, Our teams continue to work on the final fix.

Nov 28, 14:38 UTC
Update - Update: The service is available. Our teams are still working on the implementation of the final fix.

Nov 21, 10:02 UTC
Update - Update: The service is available. Our teams are still working on final fix.
We will keep you informed of the progress.

Nov 17, 15:10 UTC
Update - Update: The service is available. A final fix has yet to be deployed to permanently resolve the incident. Our teams are still working on its implementation.

Nov 16, 11:08 UTC
Monitoring - The service is available again. We keep the situation under observation for the next few hours

Nov 16, 11:07 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Nov 16, 10:40 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 16/11/2022 10:11 UTC
Service impact : The service could be unreachable.
Ongoing actions : Our teams determine the origin of this service unavailability.

item.title: [Global][Containers & Orchestration] - Load Balancer
item.description:
Dec 16, 13:30 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 16/12/2022 12:55 UTC
End Time : 16/12/2022 13:25 UTC
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Dec 16, 13:18 UTC
Update - We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

Dec 16, 13:13 UTC
Identified - Start time : 16/12/2022 12:55 UTC
Service impact : Customers won't be able to subscribe to a new Load balancer or modify or delete their current Loadbalancer.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are currently working to solve the problem. We estimate that the service will be available in 30 minutes
